variants.Description in input context: This variant alters a conserved kinase domain residue.
This variant results in a non-conservative amino acid substitution.

Material used.Description: The assay was performed using SH-SY5Y neuroblastoma cells.

Readout description.Result Description: Kinase activity increased by 30% in cells expressing the c.2005G>A variant compared to wild-type controls.
Kinase activity decreased by 15% in cells expressing the c.2538A>T variant compared to wild-type controls.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent experiments were performed using different batches of cells.

Technical replicates.Description: Each condition was measured in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells expressing a constitutively active kinase were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Empty vector-transfected cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Kinase activity within the range observed in wild-type cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Kinase activity deviating more than 2 standard deviations from the mean observed in wild-type cells.
